ai-atk-s0510a32:1_0: the Elder Gandhamādana covered with the Uppalavaṇṇā,
ai-atk-s0510a32:2_0: The thirty-five Discourses on the thirty-two marks of a Longer Discourse in the Lineages of the Thirty-Three, thirty-fours of the Four Great Kings.
ai-atk-s0510a32:3_0: Eight years of the layfolk, etc., are the first two in number.
